utter_faq/ask_check_in_time.text: Check in starts at 3 PM. Please contact the reception to request an early check-in.

utter_faq/ask_check_out_time.text: Check out is by 11 AM on your departure date. Our team is happy to store your luggage after you checkout at the reception if you need it.

utter_faq/ask_have_gym.text: The gym can be found on the ground floor. It is open to our guests 24 hours a day every day. Simply use your room key card to gain entry.

utter_faq/ask_have_restaurant.text:
The hotel has two restaurants:
 1) Hilton Fresh is a Mediterranean restaurant. It can be found on the hotel's ground floor. 
 2) Hilton Africana is an African restaurant. It can be found on the hotel's top floor.

utter_faq/ask_breakfast_info.text:
The hotel offers its guests free breakfast every morning. It is served in Hilton Africana, the ground floor restaurant.
The hours for breakfast are:
  Mondays to Fridays: 7 AM-11 AM 
  Saturdays and Sundays: 8 AM-1 PM

utter_faq/ask_have_pool.text: The hotel's pool can be found on the ground floor near the gym. The pool is open 8 AM to 10 PM every day.
